channel.title: Suncalc on Open Operational Research
channel.description: Recent content in Suncalc on Open Operational Research

item.title: 'Aint no sunshine ... in winter
item.description: Hi y’all, short one today. Partially it’s about how days of sunlight change through the year, unless you’re on the equator. Partially it’s about how hard it is to make 3d plots in a 2d space. I have SAD, which seems to flare up at the solstices and equinoxes, plus and minus a couple of weeks. The solstices make sense - there’s either too much or too little sunshine.
